pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ceteris Paribus Plots (What-If Plots) for a Single Observation // Ceteris Paribus Plots (What-If Plots) are designed to present model responses around a single point in a feature space. For example around a single prediction for an interesting observation. Plots are designed to work in a model-agnostic fashion, they are working for any predictive Machine Learning model and allow for model comparisons. The Ceteris Paribus Plots supplement the Break Down Plots from 'breakDown' package.
